duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide operational support to maintain clinic operations and ensure the best customer care for patients living with kidney disease.
Create a welcoming and professional atmosphere by greeting patients and visitors, answering phones, and assisting patients with transportation arrangements.
Maintain clinic operations by updating and maintaining medical records, preparing patient records, and assisting in auditing records for ongoing compliance.
Support financial operations by entering charges, preparing billing and patient attendance logs, and completing forms and reports as required by governmental agencies.
Ensure adequate supplies and inventory, reordering when required, and help process lab work by preparing lab slips and tubes and directing labs to the appropriate laboratory.
